mapper.insert: insert into mus_cart(cartId, memberId, clothId, clothCount) values(cartId_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{clothId}, #{clothCount})
mapper.update: update mus_cart set clothCount=#{clothCount} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select * from mus_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and clothId = #{clothId}
